document_data.mainbody:
all of the Night Brigade is an adventure pack for Dungeons & Dragons Online where the player characters return to Wheloon Prison to help the Riverside Rats gang against the murderous Night Brigade. The adventure pack was added to the game on December 11, 2024 as part of Update 71.
Rats in a Cage
The Wizards Labyrinth
The Knifes Edge
The Darkness and the Light
